function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sustained compliance with public health measures","Impact":"Increased transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide support programs for loss of income, enable working from home, limit access to public spaces, and communicate social norms","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for remote work, contact tracing technology, and public health apps","People":"General public, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities"},{"Description":"Easing of restrictions leading to increased social gatherings","Impact":"Higher opportunities for non-compliance and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions to maintain compliance, monitor public spaces, and provide ongoing communication about the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Digital surveillance technology, contact tracing technology, and public health apps","People":"General public, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities"},{"Description":"Erosion of moral support for compliance over time","Impact":"Normalization of non-compliance and shifting social norms","Mitigation":"Develop strategies to maintain moral support for compliance, address the increasing costs of compliance, and monitor social sentiment towards public health measures","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for outreach, sentiment analysis technology, and public health apps","People":"General public, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities"}]}
